Package simu.model.customerTypes

Class AbstractCustomer

java.lang.Object
simu.model.customerTypes.AbstractCustomer
Direct Known Subclasses:
Customer, TakeAway
@Entity public abstract class AbstractCustomer extends Object
Represents an abstract customer in the simulation system. This class uses inheritance to allow different types of customers.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AbstractCustomer()
    Constructor to initialize the arrival time and assign a unique ID to the customer.
